comments.author: Anna Mukhin

comments.text:
Those things are not really THAT annoying. 
1st: I live in New Zeland, it's raining there most of the time, and it's 
not like a little spill, you get wet from shoulders to toes.
2nd: Injuries suck, I know. Ignore them, walk around, do some stuff and you 
forget them really quickly.
3rd: sunglasses? Pff.
4th: Forgetting lunch, ask your friends to share with you.
5th: A zit? Mostly it's girls problem.
6th: Slipping socks. I have'em all the time, just get use to it, or buy new 
shoes\socks if it's THAT bad 4 u.
7th: 10% IDK, i don't use any phones.
8th: Food stuck, just get it out! No big deal.
9th: Losing a train of thought... Yyyyeah, that one is annoying.﻿

Forgetting your sunglasses is a 'little' thing that ruins your day? 
That's plain impossible

either because I have a severe phobia of the dark. 
Yaaay for little things that ruin other people's day and completely destroy 
your life. ﻿

Not having the correct impliment at the ready to eat the food you have.
Only having decaf coffee in the break room after a poor nights sleep.﻿
comments.author: Mrsam745

comments.text:
You just woke up, and are famished. Moms' home cooked meal last night was 
something no man should ever have to endure, so you skipped it. Your 
stomach growls more than that of 100 guard dogs being interrupted by a 
feisty squirrel. You walk down to your kitchen, you're shocked that you are 
still alive and breathing. Your brain is saying, "Healthy..." But your body 
is saying, "CEREAL!!!" Body wins (p.s. No one likes you, Brain). You open 
the snack cupboard only to find your favorite cereal. The one mom NEVER 
buys. This must have been the exceptional work of... Dad. As your mouth is 
watering and all your senses are anxiously waiting for you to eat, you get 
out a bowl and some milk. You grab your special spoon and sit down at the 
table. As you go to pour your cereal, you notice that the box is... DUN DUN 
DUNN... EMPTY!! You start questioning everything, but no answers are 
received. You are mad. You are so disappointed you don't know what to do 
with yourself. So you go to Dunkin Donuts and everything is okay because 
Dunkin Donuts is really yummy. The end.﻿
